item.description:
Sorry everyone, Have to change the day, Same place same time of day. Work is keeping me way to busy, damn that! National surf day is the 20th! Keep that in mind. Hope people can make it. Boing Boing is spending some time on surfing, There is a great deal of information here on shaping. http://gadgets.boingb...
Hope that things on the cape work out this week end . I am working on an index of surfing for the east cost,
will have it ready for the meet up.
item.how_to_find_us: Space will be set aside in the front room
item.name: Let's get together, ready for Tar & Feathers
